document_data.name: Balor
document_data.mainbody: '''Balor''' ({{Pronounce|BAY|lor|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|25}}|audio=Balor.ogg}} {{Pronounce|BAL|or|refs=|alt=yes}}) was the greatest of the [[balor]] [[tanar'ri]] [[demon]]s and the reason that his race was known as balors.
document_data.History:
Balor served all of the [[demon lord]]s at one point or another in his life. He was favored by [[Baphomet]] and [[Kostchtchie]].

In [[1485 DR]], Balor was accosted by the goddess [[Lolth]], who was then allied with Balor's greatest rival, the balor [[Errtu]]. Lolth destroyed his minions, poisoned him, and entrapped him in a web cocoon. She did this as part of her agreement with Errtu to get rid of demon lords in the [[Abyss]] in return for his aid in her plan to weaken the barriers between the Abyss and the [[Prime Material Plane]].
